flawed_nl_solution:
Mark has 10 fewer cards than Michael so Mark has 100 cards - 10 cards = 90 cards.
So, Lloyd has 90 cards / 3 = <<90/3=30.0>>30.0 cards.
All three of them have 90 cards + 30.0 cards + 100 cards = <<90+30.0+100=220.0>>220.0 cards.
Thus, they need to collect 300 cards - 220.0 cards = <<300-220.0=83.0>>83.0 more cards.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 80.0, not 83.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
